name: National monitoring of macrobenthos in the Kavala Gulf
description: Data were collected as part of a monitoring programme, studying the changes in seaweedcommunities across an eutrophication gradient in the Kavala Gulf. As part of theWaterFramework Directive (WFD), the results of this study werethen compared to the EcologicalStatus assessment of the coastline,based on the Ecological Evaluation Index (EEI).
